item.title: Help with adding display name to top of screen
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

_Vengeance:

Somewhere in the login method, loop through all the players and call the “writePlayers” method…

what doe this mean like in the code
//Playercount at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@bla@Players - " + players, 6570);
sendFrame126("@blu@Thepwnage scape", 6572);
sendFrame126("", 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673}}}
//setInterfaceWalkable(14600);//201
}

[quote="`Rich, post:27, topic:281909"]What he meant was basically;

for (Player p : Engine.players) { if (p == null || p.disconnected) { continue; } p.writePlayers(); }

The best thing to do would just use a command to show all the players online, or if you have a website, display the number of online players on there (Pretty sure there is a tutorial on this). Making it loop through all the players each time a player logs in and out would be quite retarded and pointless, though. I suggest doing what I stated in the first sentence.[/quote]

i want my name on the top also and players

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding display name to top of screen

item.title: Help with adding display name to top of screen
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

What he meant was basically;

for (Player p : Engine.players) { if (p == null || p.disconnected) { continue; } p.writePlayers(); }

The best thing to do would just use a command to show all the players online, or if you have a website, display the number of online players on there (Pretty sure there is a tutorial on this). Making it loop through all the players each time a player logs in and out would be quite retarded and pointless, though. I suggest doing what I stated in the first sentence.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with adding display name to top of screen
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

well i added it and i dont know why it doesnt work [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 09:10:20 pm[/size][hr]this is mine

[code]import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.security.;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public int totalz = totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]) + getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP));

public static boolean LoggingClicks = false;
public int JunaTele = -1;
public void println_debug(String str) {
System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: “+str);
}
public void println(String str) {
System.out.println(”[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: "+str);
}
public void staticAnimation(int graphicID, int playerX, int playerY, int heightLevel) { /Used from phates old stuff/ // credits to phate for this bit
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(playerY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(playerX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(graphicID); // Graphic ID
outStream.writeByte(heightLevel); // Height above gorund
outStream.writeWord(0); // Pause before casting
}
public void DragonLongSpecial(){ //by gander for www.rs-server.net
hitDiff = 10 + playerMaxHit; //Hit dif
inCombat(); //In combat
staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100); //Animation
setAnimation(1058); //emote
actionTimer = 25; //Timer to reset animation
teleportToX = absX; // not to move
teleportToY = absY; //not to move xD

}
// Playercount at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();

    sendFrame126("@cya@Players - @red@" + players, 6570);
    sendFrame126("@red@B@gre@o@red@o@gre@s@red@t@gre@e@red@r@gre@s@red@c@gre@a@red@p@gre@e @red@P@gre@k", 6572);
    sendFrame126("@yel@O@gre@w@yel@n@gre@e@yel@r @red@= @gre@B@yel@o@gre@o@yel@s@gre@t@yel@e@gre@r@yel@1@gre@2@yel@3", 6664);
    setInterfaceWalkable(6673); // 6673}}}
    
}[/code]
